alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Richmond; Western Essex; Western King and Queen; Westmoreland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 02 at 2:50PM EST until January 03 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 7 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph Monday. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Maryland and east central Virginia. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 7 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions in Virginia or Maryland, please call 5 1 1. For the latest road information in North Carolina, go to http://DriveNC.gov.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Essex; Richmond; Western Essex; Western King and Queen; Westmoreland
